Package de.aicard.controller

Class LearnSetController

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.controller.LearnSetController
@Controller
public class LearnSetController
extends java.lang.Object
creating/showing and editing of learnSets
Author:
Martin Kuehlborn,Clemens Berger

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getAddAccountToAdminList​(java.lang.Long learnSetId, java.lang.Long friendId, java.security.Principal principal)
    adds an Account to the adminList only the owner can add admins
    java.lang.String getCardOverview​(java.lang.Long id, java.security.Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    shows some data of the learnSet and all cards of the learnset this site gives the ability to add cards if the user is an admin the owner has edit and delete buttons for the learnSet
    java.lang.String getCreateLearnset​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    shows the createLearnset.html with a new learnSet
    java.lang.String getDeleteCard​(java.lang.Long id, java.security.Principal principal)
    deletes the given card if user has rights when deleting a card all learnSetAbos with the learnset which holds the card are updated
    java.lang.String getDeleteLearnSet​(java.lang.Long learnSetId, java.security.Principal principal)
    deletes a learnSet if the user is the owner all LearnSetAbos with this learnSet are deleted too all learnset cards and their content such as files are deleted the cardstatus of the abos are deleted
    java.lang.String getEditLearnSet​(java.lang.Long learnSetId, java.security.Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    shows the site to edit the learnSet data if the user is the owner
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> getFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
    loads file from server to frontend
    java.lang.String getLearnSets​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, java.security.Principal principal)
    get all learnSetabos of an account they are distinguished between just abos and learnsets with admin rights
    java.lang.String getRemoveAccountFromAdminList​(java.lang.Long learnSetId, java.lang.Long accountId, java.security.Principal principal)
    removes an account from the adminlist only the owner can remove admins
    java.lang.String getUnfollowedLearnSetAboId​(java.lang.Long followedLearnSetAboId, java.security.Principal principal)
    removes the learnSetAbo from the list of the account owners can't unfollow
    java.lang.String postCreateLearnset​(LearnSet newLearnset, java.security.Principal principal)
    creates a new learnSet with the given Data on the logged in Account
    java.lang.String postUpdateLearnSet​(java.lang.Long learnSetId, LearnSet learnSet, java.security.Principal principal)
    edits data of the learnSet if the user is the owner
